meanings.definition: The quality or state of being meaty.
meanings.sent1: The meatiness of the steak made it very satisfying to eat.
meanings.sent2: The meatiness of the burger was just right, not too dry or too greasy.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the meatiness of the stew was so intense, it could cure hunger instantly.
meanings.sent4: Her argument lacked the meatiness needed to convince the jury.
meanings.sent5: The meatiness of the barbecue ribs was so pronounced that it left a lasting impression on the diners.

meanings.definition: The amount of meat present in something.
meanings.sent1: The meatiness of the sandwich was generous, with layers of ham and turkey.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the meatiness of a thick-cut steak over a leaner cut.
meanings.sent3: The meatiness of the pizza surprised me; it was loaded with pepperoni slices.
meanings.sent4: The meatiness of the soup was so abundant that it felt like a meal on its own.
meanings.sent5: The meatiness of the meatball sub was so satisfying that I couldn't resist having another bite.

meanings.definition: The essence or substance of something.
meanings.sent1: The meatiness of the novel's plot kept me engaged until the very end.
meanings.sent2: The meatiness of the issue lay in its impact on the community.
meanings.sent3: The meatiness of the gossip was too juicy to ignore.
meanings.sent4: The meatiness of the debate revealed the core differences between the candidates.
meanings.sent5: The meatiness of the mystery novel made it impossible to put down.
